name: Michael TYLER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, and Department of Corrections Community Corrections Center, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Tyler v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Michael TYLER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, and Department of Corrections Community Corrections Center, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of February, 2012, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

38 A.3d 820
